text: Lienardia is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Clathurellidae.MolluscaBase (2018). Lienardia Jousseaume, 1883. Accessed through: World Register of Marine Species at: http://www.marinespecies.org/aphia.php?p=taxdetails&id;=181085 on 2018-02-22 ==Species== *Lienardia acrolineata Fedosov, 2011 *Lienardia armstrongi (G. Nevill & H.
